title: Is It Final?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon preview Game 6 of the NBA Finals tonight including if Golden State can close out the title on the road before talking a strong start for the Avalanche in the Stanley Cup Final.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Previewing Game 6 Of The NBA Finals, Can The Warriors Close It Out?
